alert.note: Alert for Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 12:18AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Valley and Sherman Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1218 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Sherman Reservoir Dam to near Hazard. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and and isolated pockets of hail up to around penny size. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Loup City, Ashton, Hazard and Sherman Reservoir Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
